articles.author: Jane C. Timm
articles.title: Indiana Senate to vote on Trump-backed congressional map despite GOP resistance - NBC News
articles.description: Trump has been pressuring Indiana Republican lawmakers for months to pass new district lines that would boost the party in next year's midterms.
articles.content: INDIANAPOLIS Indiana state senators will decide the fate of a Republican-drawn congressional map Thursday, settling a divisive, monthslong clash between GOP lawmakers who have resisted the redistrict… [+5670 chars]
